abstract: Dow Chemical says it will pay $835 million to settle longstanding class-action lawsuit after death of Justice Antonin Scalia lessened its chances of prevailing at Supreme Court.

headline.print_headline: Scalia’s Death Spurs Dow Chemical to Settle Lawsuit
headline.main: Scalia’s Death Spurs Dow Chemical to Settle Lawsuit

snippet: Dow Chemical said it would pay $835 million to settle a longstanding class-action lawsuit after the death of Justice Antonin Scalia decreased its chances of prevailing at the Supreme Court.
lead_paragraph: Dow Chemical said it would pay $835 million to settle a longstanding class-action lawsuit after the death of Justice Antonin Scalia decreased its chances of prevailing at the Supreme Court.
